title: BONUS EPISODE: Normani Talks About Her Career + New Single
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Ebro, Rosenberg and Laura Stylez star in HOT97's flagship program Ebro in the Morning! Normani sat down with Ebro in the Morning for a great conversation covering various topics throughout her career including her successes, the pressure to sometimes portray a perfect personality and working on being authentic, her journey, Cardi B, her MTV VMA performance and much more. 

LISTEN TO "TAP IN WITH TT" ON:

Apple Podcasts -https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/tap-in-with-tt/id1618314923

Hot97.com -Tap In With TT | Hot97

Spotify - https://open.spotify.com/show/0a2g28v979wHIY0Vlnrjul?si=a91f5e2a4d254f6d
